title: Laptop crashes immediately whenever I go in-game (always at the start)
body:
Before I start ramping on about my issues in life, my apologies if my English isn't the best and thank you for reading!

My laptop was full with crap and I noticed because my FPS dropped dramatically so I removed everything from it and installed Windows 10 again to fix this. That worked (hurray), and now in-game I play with 60-80 FPS and 15-30 Ping, nothing too crazy right? After a few games this annoying problem started to happen, in champion select everything is fine, the loadingscreen is fine too but whenever the game starts my laptop just completely freezes and won't react to anything at all.

So I restart my laptop and launch LoL again and afterwards when I join the game again I can just play and nothing happends. I usually miss 0-3 CS and none or a little experience so it's annoying and I have no idea what is causing it.

What I have done:
Red a lot of forums but that suggest repairing your laptop/pc, which I did,
Repair LoL and the patcher, which I did,
Clean your ventilation because overheating causes it too, but my laptop has never overheated because I have a special "Ice Cool" system of Asus which prevents that. 

If you have any suggestions what it is, please let me know. It's driving me insane. Thank you in advance!

Note: specs of my laptop
Asus A555L
IntelÂ® Core i5 4200U, 1.6Ghz - 2.6Ghz
Memory: 4Gb ddr3 1600Mhz
Video: Intel HD Graphics series
Hard drive: 500GB HDD
Display: 15.6'' HD LED LCD

replies.body:
Im having almost the same issue, with the same card. But, im crashing in almost every game i do.
Help would be so much appreciated.

There's been an issue for some players after a recent Windows 10 update where the xbox game bar is causing a freeze.  Disable the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to get that fixed.  I also recommend taking some additional measures as well since you have a fresh OS, like updating all of your drivers.  I suggest using our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide for a list of steps to tune-up your PC.  That should get everything nice and smooth!
